mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) as regDate, a.depth , a.user_no as userNo, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no =b.no order by no desc, group_no desc, order_no asc
select title , contents, user_no as userNo from board where no= #{no }
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{title } , #{contents } , 0 , now(), (select max(group_no)+1 from board b) , 1 , 0, #{userNo })
mapper.delete: delete from board where no = #{no } and user_no= #{userNo }
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title }, contents=#{contents } where no=#{no }
update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no }
mapper.select: select group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth from board where no= #{no }
